Vaseline Lip Therapy Rosy Lips – Hydrating Petroleum Jelly Balm, Pack of 2 💖

title: Vaseline Intensive Care Healthy Hands and Stronger Nails Non Greasy Women's Lotion Dry Skin, 3.4 oz
shortDescription: Vaseline Intensive Care Healthy Hands and Stronger Nails Non Greasy Lotion, 3.4 fl oz, Our hands are often the first to suffer from dry skin, taking a battering from the extreme temperatures, low humidity and harsh cleansers that chip away at the skin's natural barrier. With daily exposure to environmental triggers (like wind, lack of humidity and sun) skin's natural moisture barrier can break down, allowing for water to escape the skin. With our Vaseline Intensive Care Healthy Hands and Stronger Nails lotion, we've packed microdroplets of Vaseline Jelly and powerful moisturizers into a travel-friendly size to give you unscented healing moisture on the go for dry, rough hands. The healing microdroplets of Vaseline Jelly in our dry skin lotion locks in moisture to allow the skin's natural barrier to recover. Designed to nourish hands, Vaseline Healthy Hand and Nail Hand Cream helps soften skin and strengthen nails in two weeks. For Adult use.

title: Vaseline Radiant X Even Tone Nourishing Coconut Oil Body Lotion for Dry Skin, 11 oz
shortDescription: Vaseline Radiant X Even Tone Nourishing Coconut Oil Body Lotion for Dry Skin, 11 oz.  Vaseline Radiant X Even Tone Nourishing Body Lotion is a clinically proven lotion that visibly reduces dark spots and evens skin tone in just 14 days. It contains 1% niacinamide, coconut oil, vitamin C, peptides, and ultra-hydrating lipids that fortify the skin barrier. Co-created with dermatologists, it restores skin's natural radiance. With a 72-hour moisture range, it is free of parabens, and phthalates, and is non-comedogenic. To use, apply, and massage the lotion liberally into your skin daily for best results.

title: Vaseline Petroleum Jelly, Original
shortDescription: Vaseline Jelly is the original skin protectant, it has been used to protect, help heal, and lock in moisture for dry skin since 1870. To this day, it effectively cares for your skin. Vaseline Petroleum Jelly Original is triple-purified and hypoallergenic, and is the ideal product for a multitude of uses, including sensitive skin. Hypoallergenic Pure Petroleum Jelly. Vaseline Petroleum Jelly Original is a product you can trust. Its triple-purification seal guarantees each jar of Vaseline Jelly has been purified not once, but three times to remove impurities. It is dermatologist recommended and has been given the U.S. National Eczema Association Seal of Acceptance as appropriate for use by those with eczema and people with sensitive skin. Vaseline's white petroleum jelly is fragrance free, hypoallergenic, non-irritating, and non-comedogenic (it wonât clog your pores). Learn about the many Vaseline Petroleum Jelly uses. Petroleum Jelly uses include personal care, baby care, and beauty. By sealing in moisture, it assists the skinâs natural recovery to help dry skin heal. This can rejuvenate visibly dry skin and help reduce the appearance of fine, dry lines. Vaseline Jelly creates a protective barrier that protects skin against environmental factors, such as windburn â and has been used for over 100 years to protect minor cuts, scrapes, and burns. Many of Vaselineâs dry skin lotions contain petroleum jelly, to give your skin the extra care it needs. Explore the range of Vaseline products including Vaseline lotion and enjoy the healing power of Vaseline.

title: Vaseline Petroleum Jelly, Cocoa Butter, 7.5 oz
shortDescription:
Get a variety of skin treatments in one product with our 1.75 oz Cocoa Butter Petroleum Jelly sterile! Dermatologist recommended, hypoallergenic, and non-comedogenic - our 100% pure petroleum jelly vitamin E promises to provide you with soothing skin protection.

These preventative and protective uses include but are not limited to dry skin and eczema relief, reduction of fine lines and wrinkles, and protection from minor skin burns. It is also petroleum jelly baby-safe and has moisturizing properties that make it the ideal product for any skin type that seeks relief from dry skin as its offers lasting moisture and protection.

Be kind to your delicate skin with our petroleum jelly generic!




FOR OVERALL SKIN HEALTH

Offering you with multiple skin benefits, our safe-for-baby petroleum jelly firmly claims preventative and protective uses such as dry skin relief, eczema relief, soothing protection from minor cuts and burns, effective reduction of fine lines, relieving care for wind burns and skin chapping, prevention of diaper rash, and eye make-up removal.

Get powerful yet gentle skincare with our top-quality petroleum jelly for face and body!




CERTIFIED AND DERMATOLOGIST-TESTED

This white petroleum jelly scented with light cocoa has been tested, trusted, and recommended by dermatologists to protect our delicate skin. Ideal for all skin types including the most soft of skins, it is also hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic!

To further guarantee its reliability, our whipped petroleum jelly hand cream is certified to moisturize soft skin and alleviate dryness.

With its gentle triple-purified formula thats made with 100% pure petroleum jelly for men and women, our product ensures saturated health-giving ingredients to soothe your dainty skin and may also be used as petroleum jelly for feet!

title: Vaseline Pure Petroleum Jelly Cocoa Butter, 1.75 Oz., Pack of 3
shortDescription: Vaseline Jelly Cocoa Butter This formula works to help heal dull, dry skin and give skin a radiant, healthy look. Vaseline Petroleum Jelly has long been used to help heal dry skin and is effective at locking in moisture. Our Vaseline Jelly Cocoa Butter combines the dry skin healing benefits of Vaseline Jelly, with cocoa butter, which is known to nourish your skin. Vaseline Jelly forms a protective barrier, to seal in moisture deep within the skin's surface layers and to enhance the skin's natural barrier recovery. With its moisturizing properties, Vaseline Petroleum Jelly Cocoa Butter is great for tackling dull, dry skin and is suitable for sensitive skin. This product is also made with cocoa butter, which is known to be a great moisturizer, especially for particularly rough areas like elbows, knees and heels. Simply apply Vaseline Jelly Cocoa Butter daily to deeply condition, relieve and rejuvenate dry skin. Gentle on Skin Vaseline Jelly with Cocoa Butter isn't just good for dry skin, it's also gentle on skin. Vaseline Petroleum Jelly Cocoa Butter is made with triple-purified petroleum jelly. Vaseline wonder jelly has also been dermatologist tested and is a non-comedogenic skin protectant, meaning it won't clog your pores. These factors make it perfect for daily use. The convenient, recyclable, flip cap jar makes it easy to access the moisturizing power inside with just one hand. Choose Vaseline Petroleum Jelly Cocoa Butter and you can maintain smooth, glowing skin all year round.
